dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 2,708 scientific publications categorized into seven classes, with a total of 5,429 edges representing citations between the papers.

Kurt D Bollacker
Steve Lawrence
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 3,186 scientific publications categorized into six classes, used for predicting the category of a paper based on its title and abstract.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer

dcterms:description: A Wikipedia-based benchmark dataset for graph neural networks, featuring 11,701 nodes and 215,863 edges, categorized into 10 classes.

dcterms:description: A directed graph representing the citation network among all computer science arXiv papers indexed by MAG, with 169,343 nodes and 1,166,243 edges, categorized into 40 subject areas.
dcterms:title: OGBN-ArXiv

dcterms:creator: Xiaoxin He
Xavier Bresson
Thomas Laurent
Bryan Hooi
dcterms:description: A directed graph illustrating the citation network among all computer science arXiv papers published in 2023 or later, with 46,198 nodes and 78,543 edges, categorized into 40 subject areas.

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset comprising 2 million nodes and 61 million edges, with a subset containing 54,025 nodes and 74,420 edges, used for predicting product categories.

dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the Amazon-Electronics dataset, representing electronics-related products with 48,362 nodes and 500,928 edges, classified into 12 categories.
